name: Prism Corporate Broking Ltd
overview:
Prism Corporate Broking is a business broker providing a wide range of support to people wishing to buy or sell businesses. They operate nationwide from offices near Cambridge.

They are more than just a ‘match-maker’. They provide extensive advice on the preparation for sale, merger and acquisition, the identification and vetting of potential buyers or sellers, plus continue support and advice throughout the negotiation and transaction processes.

They primarily work with owner managers seeking to buy and sell businesses across a wide rnag of sections, but have a particular specialism in the ICT sector. Their services are focussed on businesses with turnovers between Â£0.5m and Â£10m.

Their apporach is very personal - both with clients and potential targets, placing great importance on the need for availability, continuity and support throughout the M&A process.

They are well networked in the Corporate Finanace community and have extensive databases to identify new opportunities for both buyers and sellers.
